title: Bug 14047 - StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Appending N lines to the StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
EB: When appending N lines to the StyledText in word wrap mode, only the newly added lines should be redrawn instead of redrawing the entire client area.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps:
1. Add the following line to performPaint method in StyledText class:
   System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
2. Trigger an event or action that appends N new lines to the StyledText in word wrap mode.
3. Observe the redraws occurring and verify that the entire client area is being redrawn.
